entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Kitimat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:19 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kitimat Forest Ave 08:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
Temperature: -9.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 91 %
Dewpoint: -10.4°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 08:23 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 08:23 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
